about_the_game:
[h1]Mini-Dungeon Monthly #12[/h1] Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Six adventures included!
Lair of the Infernal Thief An adventure for two to five characters of 3rd-5th level by Jennifer Brozek
The Mereswine Idol An adventure for three to four characters of 4th-5th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Rites of Delayed Spring An adventure for four to five characters of 4th-5th level by Stephen Yeardley
Sacellum of Glimmer and Gloom An adventure for four to six characters of 5th level by Stephen Radney-MacFarland
Redoubt of the Brine Clan A seacoast adventure for three to six characters of 5th-6th level by Bill Collins
Umbravania: Praise to the Profane An adventure for five to seven characters of 20th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Aaron Gentry

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.

[h1]Mini-Dungeon Monthly #12[/h1] Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Six adventures included!
Lair of the Infernal Thief An adventure for two to five characters of 3rd-5th level by Jennifer Brozek
The Mereswine Idol An adventure for three to four characters of 4th-5th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Rites of Delayed Spring An adventure for four to five characters of 4th-5th level by Stephen Yeardley
Sacellum of Glimmer and Gloom An adventure for four to six characters of 5th level by Stephen Radney-MacFarland
Redoubt of the Brine Clan A seacoast adventure for three to six characters of 5th-6th level by Bill Collins
Umbravania: Praise to the Profane An adventure for five to seven characters of 20th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Aaron Gentry

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #12

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
